name: Face Factory
description:
In the distant future in a galaxy filled with robotic entities, Facedor the Robot ponders about his long lost ancestors: Humans. In an attempt to rediscover their image, he purchases copious amounts of facial data that he must now reassemble.

Will you make bring his vision to light?

60 FPS interpolated latest version from TurboWarp:

https://turbowarp.org/821695876/fullscreen?fps=60&interpolate

For the latest version from the Scratch website:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/821695876
